name: Tribe (Fergo310)
description:
A small project we made for our Intermediate Game Programming class at UCI. Tribe is a simple and accessible Turn-Based Strategy game where you position units on the board and watch them lay siege to each other's Bases until one of them is destroyed.

Features

Local "Pass-the-controller" Multiplayer
Online Multiplayer
Local Customization
AI Managed Combat

Future Plans

More Units
Adjustable Board Size
Reworked Combat AI
Game Saving (Local and Online)

Developers

Ferenc Gozony:

  • UI/UX Designer
  • Graphic Artist
  • 3D Artist
  • Game Systems Programmer
  • Online Multiplayer Developer (Photon PUNv2)

Beckett Walters:

  • Lead Game Systems Programmer
  • Lead Game Designer
  • AI Programmer

Luke McCaw 

  • UI Developer
  • Game Designer
